context.text: List of actors who played President of the United States - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
List of actors who played President of the United States
[ edit ] Actors who played fictional presidents
[ edit ] Actors who played real presidents
[ edit ] Actors who played fictional presidents
[ edit ] Actresses who played fictional presidents
[ edit ] Actresses who played fictional presidents
[ edit ] Actors who played real presidents
This is a partial list of actors or actresses who have played the President of the United States , both fictional and non-fictional, in movies and on television series.
List of actors who played President of the United States
